description: Convert STAC Catalog to T&E baseline framework format and upload to S3
name: kitware/baseline_framework_egress

optional_parameters.description: Optionally provide an AWS profile for AWS CLI commands
optional_parameters.name: aws_profile

optional_parameters.description: Don't actually upload anything to S3
optional_parameters.help_text: If set to '1' this algorithm will use the '--dryrun' flag on any aws commands, meaning that no data will actually be uploaded
optional_parameters.name: dryrun

outputs.description: S3 output path where converted STAC Catalog JSON was written
outputs.name: output_path

outputs.description: Output S3 Bucket where output STAC Items and their assets were written
outputs.name: output_bucket

required_parameters.description: Input STAC Catalog to convert and egress
required_parameters.name: stac_catalog

required_parameters.description: S3 output path for converted STAC Catalog
required_parameters.name: output_path

required_parameters.description: Output S3 Bucket where output STAC Items and their assets will be written
required_parameters.name: output_bucket
